comments.body: Nice catch, I wonder how this ever worked ...
I'm also surprised. Thanks for fixing this.

Please feature-gate all modules that aren't already feature-gated by your changes behind `device-selected`.  Otherwise, when forgetting to select a device, you'd get a ton of compiler errors which just hide the one interesting one generated by the `compile_error!()` above.

```suggestion
#[cfg(feature = "device-selected")]
pub mod usart {
```
Your right. Added the gates and added missing pac documentation
